title: Fed Decision Fallout, Dynamic Energy Space, UPS vs. FedEx, GM’s Barra Betting on Electric and Self-Driving
itunes:title: Fed Decision Fallout, Dynamic Energy Space, UPS vs. FedEx, GM’s Barra Betting on Electric and Self-Driving
description:
Tendayi Kapfidze, Chief Economist at LendingTree, and Bloomberg News Global Macro Strategist Vincent Cignarella, break down the impact of Wednesday’s Fed decision on markets and the economy. Ryan Kelley, Portfolio Manager at Hennessy Funds, discusses investing in gas and energy. Bloomberg News Reporter Tom Black and Jim Corridore, Equity Analyst at CFRA Research, compare and contrast UPS and FedEx. Bloomberg Businessweek Writer Bryan Gruley and Bloomberg News Detroit Bureau Chief David Welch talk about General Motor’s strategy in electric and self-driving vehicles. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Detrick, Senior Market Strategist for LPL Financial. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
